xml.data:
Home » 37P1 Dhammānuloma (1), Tikapaṭṭhānapāḷi (1) » 11 Ācayagāmittika » 11.3 Paccayavāra » 11.3.1 Paccayānuloma » 11.3.1.2 Saṅkhyāvāra
Suddha
Ācayagāmittika
Paccayavāra
Paccayānuloma
Saṅkhyāvāra
Suddha
25.
1500Hetuyā sattarasa, ārammaṇe satta, adhipatiyā sattarasa, anantare satta, samanantare satta, sahajāte sattarasa, aññamaññe satta, nissaye sattarasa, upanissaye satta, purejāte satta, āsevane satta, kamme sattarasa, vipāke ekaṃ, āhāre sattarasa, indriye jhāne magge sattarasa, sampayutte satta, vippayutte sattarasa, atthiyā sattarasa, natthiyā satta, vigate satta, avigate sattarasa. (Evaṃ gaṇetabbaṃ.)
1501Anulomaṃ.
